languages.text: "Что, ледышка, не посвятили тебя в хитросплетения планов Калькасара? Кажется, кое-кого разжаловали из любимчиков".
"What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."
languages.original_text: "Что, ледышка, не посвятили тебя в хитросплетения планов Калькасара? Кажется, кое-кого разжаловали из любимчиков".

traits.locale_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “怎么了，冰人儿？原来你不知道卡尔卡扎的详细计划吗？看来核心集团里的某个人被冷落了。”
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: “怎么了，冰人儿？原来你不知道卡尔卡扎的详细计划吗？看来核心集团里的某个人被冷落了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi, le rabat-joie ? Vous voulez dire que vous n'étiez pas au courant de toutes les subtilités du plan de Calcazar ? On dirait bien que quelqu'un a été mis sur la touche... »
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi, le rabat-joie ? Vous voulez dire que vous n'étiez pas au courant de toutes les subtilités du plan de Calcazar ? On dirait bien que quelqu'un a été mis sur la touche... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué pasa, hombre de hielo? ¿Resulta que Calcazar no te ha tenido al día de todos sus planes? Parece que ni en el círculo interior se entera uno de todo».
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué pasa, hombre de hielo? ¿Resulta que Calcazar no te ha tenido al día de todos sus planes? Parece que ni en el círculo interior se entera uno de todo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「どうしたの、氷の君。カルカサルの複雑な計画を共有してなかったなんて。執行会からのけ者にされる人もいるのね」
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしたの、氷の君。カルカサルの複雑な計画を共有してなかったなんて。執行会からのけ者にされる人もいるのね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Was, Eismann, hat man Euch etwa nicht in die Feinheiten von Calcazars Plänen eingebunden? Offenbar wurde ein Teil des inneren Zirkels in der Kälte stehen gelassen."
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: "Was, Eismann, hat man Euch etwa nicht in die Feinheiten von Calcazars Plänen eingebunden? Offenbar wurde ein Teil des inneren Zirkels in der Kälte stehen gelassen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

languages.text: "Calcazar'ın planlarındaki detaylardan haberin yok muydu buz küpü? Bakıyorum birileri yakın çevreden kapı dışı edilmiş..."
languages.original_text: "What, iceman, you weren't kept in the loop about the intricacies of Calcazar's plans? Looks like some of the inner circle have been left out in the cold."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar'ın planlarındaki detaylardan haberin yok muydu buz küpü? Yakın çevreden birkaç kişi kapı dışarı edilmiş bakıyorum..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
